Author: Althbird
Text: THIS. It’s okay to set boundries

Author: 0rangevanillac0ke0
Text: You can Ask them if you could talked and tell them you appreciate that they care and worry about you, but telling them everything you eat makes you hyper focused on food and doesn’t help. It’s ok to set boundaries and let them know that there are things you’re not ok with. But it’s good you have friends that care and try to remember that what they do is coming from a place of caring and wanting to help ❤️
